title: Load Interactive Map with Nearby Stations
description: Verify that the interactive map loads correctly displaying nearby EV charging stations based on user location or default location.

steps.description: Open the ChargeSure app
Allow or provide user location
Check the map renders using OpenStreetMap with Leaflet
Check for presence of station markers near the user location
Verify user location marker is visible and accurate

title: Search Stations with Text Query and Filters
description: Verify that users can search charging stations using text input and apply filters like plug type and availability.

steps.description: Navigate to the search interface
Enter a text query for station name or location
Apply plug type filter (e.g., CCS, CHAdeMO)
Apply availability filter to show only available chargers
Verify search results list and map markers update accordingly
Verify search suggestions autocomplete correctly

title: Display Station Details Modal Correctly
description: Verify detailed station information, charger specifications, user ratings, and trust indicators display correctly in the details modal.

steps.description: Tap on a station marker or list item
Station details modal appears
Charger specifications (type, power, quantity) display correctly
User ratings and star feedback are displayed
Trust indicators are shown clearly

title: Submit Charger Rating and Feedback
description: Verify users can submit star ratings and feedback on individual chargers, and input is validated and updated in real-time.

steps.description: Open station details modal for a charger
Select a star rating (1-5 stars)
Enter feedback text
Submit rating and feedback
Validate submission is accepted and UI updates in real time
Check that invalid inputs (empty feedback if required, out-of-range stars) are rejected with error messages

title: Report Real-time Charger Status Updates
description: Verify users can report charger status changes, updates are validated, submitted, and reflected in real-time across app.

steps.description: Open status update modal from a station details page
Select a status update (e.g., available, out-of-order)
Provide optional comments
Submit status update
Update is accepted and reflected on the station's status immediately
Verify error handling if submission fails (e.g. network errors)

title: Geolocation Services Provide Accurate Position and Directions
description: Verify geolocation accurately identifies user position and direction feature provides navigation routes to a selected charger.

steps.description: Grant app permission to access device location
Verify app detects and displays user location correctly on map
Select a charging station and request directions
Verify directions are generated accurately from current location to station

title: Recent Locations Are Persisted and Displayed
description: Verify that recently viewed charge stations are tracked and stored locally, and displayed correctly across sessions.

steps.description: View multiple charging station details sequentially
Check recent locations list updates after each view
Close and reopen the app
Verify recent locations persist and display correctly from local storage

title: Offline Support with Cached Data Availability
description: Verify app functionality when offline including use of cached data, appropriate offline indicators, and limited features.

steps.description: Load app online and browse station data
Disconnect network connection
Verify offline indicator is visible in the UI
Attempt to view cached stations data
Verify cached station information is accessible for previously loaded data
Attempt to perform actions requiring network (e.g., rating submission)
Verify appropriate error or offline message is shown

title: PWA Installation Banner and App Installation Flow
description: Verify that PWA installation banner is shown on supported devices and the app installs successfully.

steps.description: Access the app from a supported mobile browser
Verify PWA installation banner is displayed appropriately
Trigger the install process via the banner
Verify the app installs and launches as a standalone PWA

title: UI Responsiveness Across Devices and Screen Sizes
description: Verify that the UI adapts correctly on different device sizes and orientations, including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open app on desktop browser
Verify layout is correct and all components visible
Open app on various mobile devices or emulated screen sizes
Verify touch-friendly design, scaling, and scrollbar usability
Rotate device to landscape and portrait
Check UI adjusts fluidly without breaking layout or content overflow

title: Error Handling for Network and API Failures
description: Verify that when network or API errors occur, the app displays user-friendly error messages and continues to function gracefully.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or server error during data fetch
Verify user-friendly error message is displayed
Verify app functionality continues (e.g., UI remains responsive)
Simulate error submitting ratings or status updates
Verify appropriate error feedback is shown to user

title: Analytics Capture User Interaction Events
description: Verify that user events such as station views, searches, and ratings are tracked accurately without affecting performance.

steps.description: Perform various user interactions: search stations, view station details, submit ratings
Verify events are logged correctly in analytics backend or mock
Verify no perceptible performance degradation occurs during tracking

title: Database Schema and Data Seeding Integrity
description: Verify that database migrations apply successfully and data seeding scripts populate test and development data correctly.

steps.description: Run database schema migrations on a fresh test DB
Verify schema tables and constraints are created without errors
Execute data seeding script
Verify expected number of stations, chargers, and ratings are inserted

title: Station List Display Sorting and Distance Calculation
description: Verify the station list displays detailed station info, calculates distances from user, and supports sorting correctly.

steps.description: Open stations list page
Verify station country, address, charger specs, and distances are shown
Sort stations by distance ascending and descending
Verify list reorders correctly according to sort

title: Offline Caching Fallback for Interactive Map Data
description: Verify map station markers and relevant data remain accessible from cache when offline after initial online load.

steps.description: Load map and station data online
Go offline
Verify previously loaded markers are still visible on the map
Verify user location marker updates with cached data or properly handles absence
